snippet: Andrew Bynum had 29 points and 13 rebounds in his season debut after a four-game suspension for a flagrant foul in the playoffs.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers center Andrew Bynum debuts after four-game suspension and helps Lakers defeat the Denver Nuggets, 92-89; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Bynum had 29 points and 13 rebounds in his season debut after a four-game suspension for a flagrant foul in the playoffs.

headline.seo: Bynum, Off Suspension, Lifts Lakers Over Nuggets
headline.main: His Suspension Over, Bynum Shores Up Lakers
headline.print_headline: His Suspension Over, Bynum Shores Up Lakers
